Package de.chojo.sadu.tests

Class DatabaseVersionChecks

java.lang.Object
de.chojo.sadu.tests.DatabaseVersionChecks
public class DatabaseVersionChecks
extends Object
The DatabaseVersionChecks class provides methods for checking the content of the version file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    DatabaseVersionChecks()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void all()
    Checks if the version exists, is not blank, and the format is correct.
    static void assertFormat()
    Asserts that the format of a resource content matches the expected format.
    static void assertFormat​(String version)
    Asserts that the given version string follows the expected format <major>.<patch>.
    static void assertVersionExists()
    Checks if the version file exists in the "database" directory.
    static void assertVersionNotBlank()
    Asserts that the version in the specified file is not blank.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseVersionChecks

      public DatabaseVersionChecks()

  • Method Details

    • assertVersionExists

      public static void assertVersionExists()
      Checks if the version file exists in the "database" directory.

      If the version file is missing, it throws an exception with an error message.

    • assertVersionNotBlank

      public static void assertVersionNotBlank() throws IOException
      Asserts that the version in the specified file is not blank.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • assertFormat

      public static void assertFormat() throws IOException
      Asserts that the format of a resource content matches the expected format.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error reading the resource content

    • assertFormat

      public static void assertFormat​(String version)
      Asserts that the given version string follows the expected format <major>.<patch>.
      Parameters:
      version - the version string to be validated

    • all

      public static void all() throws IOException
      Checks if the version exists, is not blank, and the format is correct.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during the checking process
